TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加属性具有扩展至逻辑树中子元素的可浏览范围。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property has a browsable scope that extends to child elements in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 术语的含义`browsable`此说明中使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]类似于为提供的说明，但附加的属性的可浏览状态是专门针对的属性信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，因为附加的属性是主要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 当这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]应用于附加属性 get 访问器这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定附加的属性浏览的附加的属性的所有者时其他元素的父元素。When this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied to the get accessor for an attached property, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies that an attached property is browsable when the attached property owner is a parent element of other elements. 如果使用的类型描述符信息、 设计器应将此属性作为可浏览属性添加到的逻辑树中的所有子元素，则解释由设计器，基于父元素与此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]应用。When interpreted by a designer that uses type descriptor information, the designer should add this property as a browsable property to all child elements in the logical tree, based on the parent element with this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied. 通常情况下，可浏览状态与功能类似。Generally, the browsable state parallels functionality. 例如，指定的子元素的元素上可浏览，这是因为包括代码，以检查的任何设置值对子元素。For example, is designated browsable on elements that are child elements of a , because includes code for checking any set values of on child elements. 这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]父元素位置的支持两种类型的树检测模式： 浅表的模式下和深层模式。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports two types of tree detection modes for parent element positions: a shallow mode, and a deep mode. 浅表的模式，这是默认模式是应用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，要求的直接父元素是可浏览的附加属性的顺序中的属性的所有者类型。The shallow mode, which is the default mode for an applied [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], requires that the immediate parent element be the owner type of the property in order for the attached property to be browsable. 通过应用具有的属性声明深模式作为`true`。The deep mode is declared by applying the attribute with as `true`. 深模式是限制性较弱的因为它仅需要所有者类型是某个位置中的上级方向逻辑树，并因此附加的属性是对所有子元素，不仅仅是在直接子元素可浏览。The deep mode is less restrictive because it only requires that the owner type be somewhere in the ancestor direction of the logical tree., and therefore the attached property is browsable on all child elements, not just immediate child elements. 其中的逻辑树中插入元素应不报告为 true 的父元素的附加的属性用法应用深层模式。The deep mode is applied for attached property usages where intervening elements in the logical tree should not be reported as the true parent element. 隐式集合 (例如， ，是在隐式的) 不被视为是父元素的方式这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]声明树检测模式。Implicit collections (for example, the that is implicit in the of a ) are not considered to be parent elements for purposes of how this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declares the tree detection mode. 这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]仅应在附加的属性定义了 get 访问器上应用。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不适用于此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]到 set 访问器。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 尽管它是正在进行的可浏览的设置操作的直观地[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]在子元素，它是存在性和 get 访问器上控制 true 行为的父元素的特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on child elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the parent element that controls the true behavior. 附加的属性是否可浏览子元素上不是绝对保证实际上有某种方式中的父元素处理的附加的属性值。Whether an attached property is browsable on a child element is not an absolute guarantee that the attached property value is really processed by the parent element in some manner. 此外，值不是绝对保证处理作用域不会或未超出的直接父元素。Also, the value is not an absolute guarantee that the processing scope does or does not extend beyond the immediate parent element. 所有这是特定的实现。All this is implementation specific. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]用于报告的可浏览状态用于报告的使用情况信息和功能的附加属性信息的最佳可用机制。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] for reporting the browsable state is the best available mechanism for reporting the usage information and functional information for an attached property. 因此，你通常可以假定附加属性的可浏览状态为类似于如何处理或解释应用程序代码中的相关父元素的子元素上的附加的属性值的行为。Therefore, you can generally assume that the browsable state of an attached property is analogous to the behavior of how an attached property value on a child element is processed or interpreted by the relevant parent element in your application code. 有关声明的附加属性的常规信息，请参阅[附加属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类型的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认值是 `false`。The default for is `false`.

span.span: Determines whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果指定的 等于当前的 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持的此公开的一个可能的设置值的值是否相等[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 返回此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持基于此公开的一个可能的设置值的两个可能的哈希值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports two possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeDescendants { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值声明是否在应用此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的附加属性上使用深层模式来检测父元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether to use the deep mode for detection of parent elements on the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied.

value.span: 如果对于拥有附加属性的父元素的逻辑树中的所有子元素来说，附加属性都可浏览，则为 。

span.span: if the attached property is browsable for all child elements in the logical tree of the parent element that owns the attached property.

value.span: 如果仅对于拥有附加属性的父元素的直接子元素来说，附加属性才是可浏览的，则为 。

span.span: if the attached property is only browsable for immediate child elements of a parent element that owns the attached property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由定义的附加属性的大多数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]适用进行此操作的默认值而作为`false`。Most of the attached properties defined by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that apply do so with the default of as `false`. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类型的成员通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
